ygData.subject: RE: Evocation!
ygData.msgSnippet: Almost forgot!  Color Flux is your friend!  LOL! I just remembered a story I read from an Enchanter in Kelethin. He was testing his new spells,
ygData.messageBody:
<snip>
Almost forgot! Color Flux is your friend!
<snip>

LOL! I just remembered a story I read from an Enchanter in Kelethin. He was
testing his new spells, and was trying out Color Flux. He was attacking
something underneith the city itself which he pulled there from the forrest.
Shortly after hitting the Color Flux hot-key a few times he noticed
Merchants from the city above started jumping onto the ground around him.
HEH! He had enough time to think: WTF? when they started to beat the crap
out of him. It was a short battle.

Not sure if this is fixed, but I would be careful using this in dungeons
that stack rooms. If you hit it while on 1st floor Befallen, you may end up
bringing the Elf Skeleton from the 3rd door up to the top floor.
I think this is similar to the Rogue ability Sense Traps. I works in your
general area, but does not take into account virtical displacement. Either
does Levitate (MoBs still know you are over their head at 50 feet and can
still punch you from the ground). Ah well.

Or am I totally off as to why this may have happened.

--
Bahir
